resolution.name: Fixed

fields.description:
h5.Description:
Due to the new Android tooling changes from Google, the help text for "--device-id" in "appc ti build -h" command should be "the id of the Android emulator ....." instead of "the name of the Android emulator ....." .
fields.summary: Android: Change help text for "--device-id" to use "id" instead of "name".
fields.environment:

comments.body:
Ti SDK master PR: https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/pull/8991
Ti SDK 6_1_X PR: https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/pull/8992
Ti SDK 6_0_X PR: https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/pull/8993

Verified the fix in SDK 6.0.4.v20170425123820.

The help for flag {{--device-id}} shows {{id}}:
{code}
-C, --device-id <name>            the id of the Android emulator or the device id to install the
                                     application to
{code}

Closing.

Studio Ver : 4.8.1.201612050850
SDK Ver :    6.0.4.v20170425123820
